charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; 846 Conspiracy to distribute 100 kilos or more of marijuana (Schedule I) October 1994 (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 77 months w/4 years SR w/sp. cond. that deft part. in substance abuse treat/testing which may include residential treatment w/portion of cost assessed to deft. Sentence is concurrent w/State Court sentence imposed 5/23/95. Credit for time served. SA of $50. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21 USC 841(a)(1) &; 846 (Conspiracy w/Intent to Distribute Marijuana-Sch. I controlled Substance)
